Werkzeuge für Bearbeitung Schaumstoff Styropor Der Qualitätsgedanke steht ZeimTec Stelle. Wir liefern unseren Kunden qualitativ hochwertige Produkte bieten qualitativ anspruchsvolle Dienstleistungen. Wir liefern Raspel-Fräswerkzeuge für Hartschaum, Weichschaum Styropor, Bandmessermaschinen, Schwingsägen, HM-Fräswerkzeuge, Fräsmaschinen Absaugung, Raspeln, Raspeln für medizinischen Bereich, Hohlfräser, Entgrater, Maschinen für Konfektionierung, Heißdraht Heißdrahtschneider, Handfräsen Sonderanfertigungen Kundenspezifiaktion. ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Box 26 60, D-87416 Kempten/Allgäu Tel. +49 – (0)831 – 5 20 91 45, Fax: +49 – (0)831 – 5 20 91 47 E-Mail: kempten(at)zeim.net Wir bieten Ihnen folgende Produkte: HM-Fräswerkzeuge Changemaster Z400 , CNC-Werkzeuge , Nutenwalze Z1050 , Sägeblätter Z1500 , Segmentzerspaner Z500 , TopCut Z300 , Zinkenmesserkopf Z800 - Raspelwerkzeuge Zylinderschaftsfräser Z72 , Fasenfräser Z73 , Lochfräser Z74 , Abrundungsfräser Z75 , Schwalbenschwanz Z76 , Tellerfräser Z65 , Profilwalze Z90 , Profilradiusfräser Z100 , Profilfräser Z500.M , Profilfräser Z600 , Profilfräser Z700 - Schneider Foamknife - Modellierung Foamdesigner - Konfektionieren Rillo - Entgrater Gratex - Bandmessermaschinen Serie Beta , Serie Delta - Tischfräsmaschinen - Hohlfrässysteme CUTPRO , Hohlwellenspindel KM2 , Speedmaster HSC - Handfräse StyroMiller - Heißdraht Styro Cutter Z140 , Typ SC 98 - Schwingsäge MultiCut - Absaugung Typ EX10 , Typ EX100 - Medizintechnik Medizinische Raspeln © Copyright 2014 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Impressum Extranet AGB Language

ZEIM TECHNOLOGY - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Previous Next ZEIM is modern, success-oriented company with long tradition the plastic foam industry and provides high-quality products worldwide. Milling tools for foam materials It is ZeimTec’s intention to provide high-quality products to its customers of the foamed material industry... more Milling, rasping, cutting, modelling, deflashing... Based on the experience of many decades the manufacture of tools and machines... more We are experts for generations - ZEIM In 1860, August Kessel founded the original rasp cutting shop the main business of... more Simply talk to us - we'll be happy to consulting! The satisfaction of our customers is the key to success. For this reason, we want to deliver... more Tools and machines for foam and Styropor ZeimTec’s focus is on quality. We supply high-quality products to our customers and offer services that are demanding quality. We deliver rasp milling tools for rigid and flexible foam materials / foam rubber and Styropor, band knife cutting machines, swinging motion saws, HM-milling tools, milling machines and vacuum systems, rasps, rasps for the medical technology, hollow milling systems, deflasher, machines for fabrication, hot wire and hot wire cutter, hand-milling units and special profiles according to customer's specification. ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Box 26 60, D-87416 Kempten/Allgäu Phone +49 – (0)831 – 5 20 91 45, Fax: +49 – (0)831 – 5 20 91 47 e-mail: kempten(at)zeim.net We offer the following products: HM-Milling Tools such as Changemaster Z400 , CNC Tools , Groove milling cylinders , Saw blades Z1500 , Segment cutting tool Z500 , TopCut Z300 , Dovetailing cutter head Z800 - Rasp Milling Tools such as Rounding off cutter Z75 , Chamfering cutter Z73 , Punching cutter Z74 , Profile cutter Z500.M , Profile cutter Z700 , Rounding of cutter Z100, Trueing Cylinder Z90 , Dovetailed cutter Z76 , Plate-shaped cutter Z65 , Shank cylindrical cutter Z72 - Knife such as Foamknife - Modelling such as Foamdesigner - Fabrication such as Rillo - Deflasher such as Gratex - Band knife cutting such as Serie Beta , Serie Delta - Milling Machines such as Spindle milling machines - Hollow milling systems such as CUTPRO , Speedmaster HSC , Hollow shaft spindle KM2 - Hand-milling unit such as StyroMiller - Hot Wire such as Styro Cutter Z140 , Typ SC 98 - Oscillating saws such as Multicut - Foam vacuum systems such as Typ EX10 , Typ EX100 - Medical engineering such as Medical Rasps © Copyright 2014 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Imprint Extranet AGB Language

AGB - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt AGB AGB Paragraphen-Übersicht: § 1 Allgemeines § 2 Angebote, Leistungsumfang Vertragsabschluss § 3 Preise Zahlungsbedingungen § 4 Aufrechnung Zurückhaltung § 5 Lieferfrist § 6 Gefahrübergang § 7 Eigentumsvorbehalt § 8 Mängelansprüche § 9 Haftung § 1 Allgemeines (1) Für Lieferungen sonstigen Leistungen gelten ausschließlich nachstehenden Verkaufs- Lieferbedingungen; gelten gegenüber Unternehmern Sinne § 310 Abs. 1 i.V.m. § 14 Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch. (2) Abweichende Bedingungen Käufers, Verkäufer ausdrücklich anerkennt, unverbindlich, Verkäufer ausdrücklich widerspricht. (3) Einbeziehung Auslegung Verkaufs- Lieferbedingungen regeln Abschluss Auslegung Rechtsgeschäfte Käufer ausschließlich Recht Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Die Anwendung einheitlichen Gesetzes über Abschluss internationalen Kaufverträgen über bewegliche Sachen, einheitlichen Gesetzes über internationalen Kauf beweglicher Sachen UN-Kaufrechts ausgeschlossen. (4) Die Unwirksamkeit einzelner Bestimmungen Vertrags Bestandteile lässt Wirksamkeit übrigen Regelungen unberührt. Die Vertragspartner Rahmen Zumutbaren Treu Glauben verpflichtet, unwirksame Bestimmung wirtschaftlichen Erfolg gleichkommende wirksame Regelung ersetzen, sofern wesentliche Änderung Vertragsinhaltes herbeigeführt wird; Gleiche gilt, falls regelungsbedürftiger Sachverhalt ausdrücklich geregelt ist. (5) Erfüllungsort für mittelbar unmittelbar Vertragsverhältnis ergebenden Verpflichtungen, einschließlich Zahlungspflicht, Sitz Verkäufers. (6) Gerichtsstand für Firmensitz Verkäufers zuständige Gerichtsort, soweit Käufer Kaufmann ist. Der Verkäufer berechtigt, Gericht klagen, für Sitz Niederlassung Käufers zuständig ist. § 2 Angebote, Leistungsumfang Vertragsabschluss (1) Vertragsangebote Verkäufers freibleibend. (2) Für Umfang vertraglich geschuldeten Leistung ausschließlich Auftragsbestätigung Verkäufers maßgebend. (3) Änderungen Konstruktion, Werkstoffwahl, Spezifikation Bauart behält Verkäufer Absendung Auftragsbestätigung vor, sofern Änderungen weder Auftragsbestätigung Spezifikation Käufers widersprechen. Der Käufer darüber hinaus darüber hinausgehenden Änderungsvorschlägen Verkäufers einverstanden erklären, soweit für Käufer zumutbar sind. (4) Teillieferungen zulässig. (5) Die Angebot Auftragsbestätigung zugrunde liegenden Unterlagen Abbildungen, Zeichnungen, Maß- Gewichtsangaben Regel Annäherungswerte verstehen, sofern ausdrücklich verbindlich bezeichnet werden. § 3 Preise Zahlungsbedingungen (1) Die Preise gelten Werk ausschließlich Verpackung sonstiger Versand- Transportspesen. Die Verpackung Selbstkosten berechnet zurückgenommen, Verkäufer kraft zwingender gesetzlicher Regelung hierzu verpflichtet ist. (2) Liegen Vertragsschluss Auslieferung 4 Monate, Lieferverzögerung Verkäufers vertreten ist, Verkäufer Preis Berücksichtigung eingetretener Material-, Lohn- sonstiger Nebenkosten, Verkäufer tragen sind, angemessen erhöhen. Erhöht Kaufpreis 40%, Käufer berechtigt, Vertrag zurückzutreten. (3) Berücksichtigt Verkäufer Änderungswünsche Käufers, hierdurch entstehenden Mehrkosten Käufer Rechnung gestellt. (4) Bei schuldhafter Überschreitung Zahlungsfrist Vorbehalt Geltendmachung weitergehender Ansprüche Zinsen Höhe 8 % über jeweils geltenden Basiszinssatz verlangt. § 4 Aufrechnung Zurückhaltung Aufrechnung Zurückhaltung ausgeschlossen, denn, Aufrechnungsforderung unbestritten rechtskräftig festgestellt ist. § 5 Lieferfrist Die Angabe Lieferzeitpunktes erfolgt bestem Ermessen verlängert angemessen, Käufer seinerseits erforderliche vereinbarte Mitwirkungshandlungen verzögert unterlässt. Das Gleiche gilt Maßnahmen Rahmen Arbeitskämpfen, insbesondere Streik Aussperrung Eintritt unvorhergesehener Hindernisse, außerhalb Willens Verkäufers liegen, z.B. Lieferverzögerung Vorlieferanten, Verkehrs- Betriebsstörungen, Werkstoff- Energiemangel etc. Auch Käufer veranlasste Änderungen gelieferten Waren führen angemessenen Verlängerung Lieferfrist. § 6 Gefahrübergang Die Gefahr Käufer über, sobald Verkäufer Ware Käufer Verfügung gestellt Käufer anzeigt. § 7 Eigentumsvorbehalt (1) Der Verkäufer behält Eigentum gelieferten Waren vollständigen Bezahlung vor. Der Eigentumsvorbehalt gilt auch, sämtliche, künftige bedingte Forderungen Geschäftsverbindung, Käufer Verkäufer erfüllt sind. (2) Der Käufer Sicherungsübereignung Verpfändung Ware befugt, Veräußerung Vorbehaltsware geordneten Geschäftsgang berechtigt. Die hieraus gegenüber Geschäftspartnern entstehenden Forderungen hiermit Verkäufer ab. (3) Wird Ware Käufer be- verarbeitet, erstreckt Eigentumsvorbehalt gesamte Sache. Der Käufer erwirbt Miteigentum Bruchteil, Verhältnis Wertes Ware Verkäufer gelieferten Ware entspricht. (4) Übersteigt Wert sämtlicher für Verkäufer bestehenden Sicherheiten bestehenden Forderungen nachhaltig 10 %, Verkäufer Verlangen Käufers Sicherheiten Wahl Verkäufers freigeben. (5) Der Verkäufer berechtigt, Eigentumsvorbehaltsrechte geltend machen, Vertrag zurückzutreten. § 8 Mängelansprüche (1) Ist Kauf für Teile Handelsgeschäft, Käufer Ware unverzüglich Erhalt, soweit ordnungsgemäßem Geschäftsgang tunlich ist, untersuchen, und, Mangel zeigt, Verkäufer unverzüglich Anzeige machen. Unterlässt Käufer Anzeige, gilt Ware genehmigt, denn, Mangel handelt, Untersuchung erkennbar war. Im Übrigen gelten §§ 377 ff. HGB. (2) Die Mängelansprüche Nacherfüllung beschränkt. Bei Fehlschlagen Nacherfüllung Käufer Recht, Wahl Herabsetzung Vergütung Rückgängigmachung Vertrages verlangen. (3) Weitergehende Ansprüche Käufer, soweit Garantieübernahme resultieren, ausgeschlossen. Dies gilt Vorsatz, grober Fahrlässigkeit Verletzung wesentlicher Vertragspflichten Verkäufers. (4) Die Mängelansprüche verjähren Jahr Lieferung Kaufsache. § 9 Haftung Schadensersatzansprüche Käufers ausgeschlossen. Dies gilt Vorsatz, grober Fahrlässigkeit, Verletzung wesentlicher Vertragspflichten Verkäufers Garantieübernahmen Einkaufsbedingungen I. Allgemeines, Geltungsbereich Wir bestellen ausschließlich Zugrundelegung Allgemeinen Einkaufsbedingungen; entgegenstehende unseren Einkaufsbedingungen abweichende Bedingungen Lieferanten erkennen an, denn, hätten schriftlich zugestimmt. II. Angebot, Vertragsabschluss 1. Nimmt Lieferant Bestellung Seite innerhalb 2 Wochen Zugang an, Angebot gebunden. 2. Bestellungen, Verträge Art Änderungen Ergänzungen wirksam, schriftlich Datenfernübertragung maschinell lesbare Datenträger erfolgen. 3. Die Ausführung Bestellung gilt Anerkennung Bedingungen. III. Preise, Rechnung, Zahlung, Forderungsabtretung, Aufrechnung, Zurückbehaltungsrecht 1. Die vereinbarten Preise Festpreise gelten, soweit Vertrag anderes vereinbart, frei Empfangswerk einschließlich Verpackungs- Transportkosten Transportversicherung zuzüglich jeweils geltenden gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer. Sofern einzelvertraglich anderes vereinbart ist, gelten für Bezeichnung Preisstellung Vorschriften Incoterms jeweils gültigen Fassung bzw. Regeln für einheitliche Auslegung Vertragsklauseln internationalen Handelskammer, Paris. 2. Die Zahlung erfolgt Abzug 3 % Skonto innerhalb 30 Tagen Lieferung/Leistung Eingang ordnungsgemäßen Rechnung Gutbefund Ware 90 Tagen rein netto. 3. Der Lieferant berechtigt, behaupteten Forderungen Gesellschaft vorherige Zustimmung aufzurechnen, denn, Forderung unstreitig rechtskräftig festgestellt. 4. Die Geltendmachung Zurückbehaltungsrechtes Lieferanten anerkannter rechtskräftig festgestellter Gegenansprüche ausgeschlossen, soweit Ansprüche Vertragsverhältnis beruhen. 5. Vertragliche Ansprüche aufgrund Zusammenhang Bestellung verjähren Ablauf Jahren Datum Erhalts Lieferung Rechnung. IV. Versand, Lieferung, Gefahrübergang 1. Alle Bestellzeichen Bestellnummern Bestellung betreffenden Papieren (Auftragsbestätigung, Lieferschein, Frachturkunden, Rechnungen, usw.) stets wiederholen. 2. Lieferscheine Rechnungen doppelter Ausfertigung einzureichen. 3. Lastwagenabfertigung erfolgt montags donnerstags 7.30 Uhr 15.00 Uhr, freitags 7.30 Uhr 13.00 Uhr besonderer Vereinbarung. 4. Höhere Kosten Spesen, infolge Abweichung Normalversandablauf infolge Abweichung geforderter Versandart (Straße, Schiene o. ä.) auftreten, anerkannt, schriftlich vereinbart wurden. Dies gilt insbesondere dann, Ware Terminüberschreitung Eilwege versandt muss;. 5. Sämtliche Sendungen fracht- nebenkostenfrei abzufertigen. Unsere jeweiligen Versandvorschriften genau beachten. 6. Der Versand erfolgt Gefahr Lieferanten. Die Gefahr Verschlechterung, einschließlich zufälligen Untergangs, bleibt Ablieferung gewünschten Lieferanschrift bzw. Verwendungsstelle Lieferanten. 7. Für Folgen unrichtiger Frachtbrief-Deklaration haftet Lieferant. Versandanzeige sofort Abgang einzelnen Sendung einzureichen. Fehlen Versandpapieren bezeichnete Empfangsstelle, Abteilung, Battenfeld-Artikelnummer, Bestellnummer, Betreffvermerk Ausstellungsvermerk, entstehenden Kosten Lasten Lieferanten. 8. Teillieferungen akzeptieren vorheriger, schriftlicher Zustimmung. Bei vereinbarten Teilsendungen verbleibende Restmenge auszuführen. 9. Bei früherer Anlieferung vereinbart, behalten Recht vor, Rücksendung Kosten Lieferanten vorzunehmen. Erfolgt vorzeitiger Lieferung Rücksendung, lagert Ware Liefertermin Kosten Gefahr Lieferanten. Die Bezahlung Rechnung erfolgt fristgerecht bezogen vereinbarten Termin. V. Liefertermine, Lieferverzug, Vertragsstrafe, Annahme Ware, Rücktritt 1. Die vereinbarten Termine verbindlich. Maßgebend für Einhaltung Liefertermins Lieferzeit Eingang Ware einwandfreier Qualität genannten Lieferanschrift bzw. Verwendungsstelle bzw. Rechtzeitigkeit erfolgreichen Abnahme. 2. Erkennt Lieferant, vereinbarten Termine irgendwelchen Gründen eingehalten können, unverzüglich Angabe Gründe Dauer Verzögerung schriftlich mitzuteilen. 3. Im Falle Lieferverzuges berechtigt, Vertragsstrafe Höhe 0,1% Lieferwertes Werktag Verzugs verlangen, 5 % Lieferwertes. Wir berechtigt, Vorbehalt Vertragsstrafe innerhalb 10 Arbeitstagen, gerechnet Entgegennahme verspäteten Lieferung, gegenüber Lieferanten erklären. VI. Umweltschutz Unfallbestimmungen Der Lieferant verpflichtet, Liefergegenstand für Umweltschutz Unfallschutz erforderlichen Vorkehrungen treffen behördlichen gesetzlichen Anforderungen berücksichtigen. Wir berechtigt, Bescheinigung zuständigen Berufsgenossenschaft verlangen, Einhaltung Bestimmungen Verhütung Unfällen ergibt. VII. Spezifikation, Gewährleistung, Haftung 1. Der Lieferant garantiert, sämtliche gelieferten Gegenstände erbrachten Leistungen Zeitpunkt Lieferung neuesten Stand Technik, einschlägigen rechtlichen Bestimmungen Vorschriften Richtlinien Behörden, Berufsgenossenschaften Fachverbänden entsprechen. Sind Einzelfall Abweichungen Vorschriften notwendig, Lieferant hierzu schriftliche Zustimmung einholen. Die Gewährleistungs- bzw. Garantieverpflichtung Lieferanten Zustimmung berührt. 2. Das Recht, Art Nacherfüllung wählen, steht Werkvertrag grundsätzlich zu. § 439 BGB gilt entsprechend. 3. Wir können Mangels gelieferten Produktes erstellten Werkes erfolglosem Ablauf Nacherfüllung bestimmten angemessenen Frist Mangel beseitigen Ersatz erforderlichen Aufwendungen verlangen, Lieferant Nacherfüllung Recht verweigert. Diesbezüglich gilt gesetzliche Regelung Selbstvornahme Werkvertrag (§ 637 BGB) für Kaufvertrag entsprechend. Unbeschadet gesetzlichen Regelung können dringenden Fällen, insbesondere Abwehr akuten Gefahr erheblichen Schäden Bestimmung Frist Nacherfüllung Mangel Kosten Lieferanten beseitigen. 4. Mussten Folge Mangelhaftigkeit Lieferanten gelieferten Sache bzw. gelieferten Werkes Lieferanten gelieferte Sache gelieferte Werk zurücknehmen, Kaufpreis- bzw. Vergütungsminderung hinnehmen unserem Abnehmer Schadensersatz Aufwendungsersatz leisten, bedarf für Gewährleistungsansprüche Lieferanten (§§ 437, 634 BGB) Abnehmer gegenüber geltend gemachten Mangels erforderlichen Fristsetzung nicht. 5. Wir können Lieferanten Ersatz Aufwendungen verlangen, Verhältnis unserem Abnehmer Zweck Nacherfüllung tragen (insbesondere aufgewendeten Transport-, Wege-, Arbeits- Materialkosten), unserem Abnehmer geltend gemachte Mangel übergang Gefahr vorhanden war. 6. Die Gewährleistungsfrist beträgt 24 Monate, soweit ausdrücklich anderes vereinbart wurde. Sie beginnt übergabe Liefergegenstandes benannten Dritten vorgeschriebenen Empfangs- bzw. Verwendungsstelle. Sofern Abnahme gesetzlich vertraglich vorgesehen ist, beginnt Gewährleistungsfrist erfolgreichen Abnah-me. Verzögert Abnahme Liefergegenstandes Verschulden Lieferanten, beginnt Gewährleistungsfrist spätestens 12 Monate Bereitstellung Liefergegenstandes Abnahme. 7. Tritt 12 Monaten Gewährleistungsfrist Mangel auf, vermutet, Mangel Zeitpunkt Gefahrübergangs bestand, denn, Vermutung Art Sache Mangels unvereinbar. 8. Sämtliche zuvor genannten Mängelansprüche gesetzlichen Gewährleistungsansprüche verjähren 24 Monate Erhebung Mängelrüge innerhalb Gewährleistungsfrist, sofern Gesetz Vertrag längere Frist vorsehen. Die Verjährungsfrist endet Ende Gewährleistungsfrist. Die Verjährung genannten Mängelansprüche gesetzlichen Gewährleistungsansprüche frühestens Monate Zeitpunkt ein, etwaige Regressansprüche unseres Abnehmers Mängel erfüllt haben. Diese Ablaufhemmung endet spätestens fünf Jahre Lieferant Sache abgeliefert bzw. Werk abgenommen haben. 9. Erfüllt Lieferant Nacherfüllungsverpflichtung Mangelbeseitigung, beginnt Abnahme Mängelbeseitigungsarbeiten Verjährungsfrist für Leistung neu laufen. Erfüllt Lieferant Nacherfüllungsverpflichtung Ersatzlieferung, beginnt für Ersatz gelieferte Produkt / Werk Ablieferung / Abnahme Verjährungsfrist neu laufen. 10. Bei Rechtsmängeln stellt Lieferant eventuell bestehenden Ansprüchen Dritter frei. Hinsichtlich Rechtsmängeln beträgt Verjährungsfrist Jahre. Diese Verjährungsfrist beginnt Jahres, Anspruch entstanden Anspruch begründenden Umständen Person Schuldners Kenntnis erlangt grobe Fahrlässigkeit erlangen müssten, Rücksicht Kenntnis grob fahrlässige Unkenntnis Jahren Entstehung an. 11. Hat Lieferant Bedenken gewünschte Art Ausführung erkennt unseren Unterlagen Zeichnungen Fehler, unverzüglichen schriftlichen Mitteilung gegenüber verpflichtet. 12. Die Untersuchung Ware etwaige Qualitäts- Quantitätsabweichungen erfolgt rechtzeitig, innerhalb 10 Arbeitstagen Ablieferung durchgeführt wird; Rüge rechtzeitig, sofern innerhalb 10 Arbeitstagen Entdeckung Mangels Lieferanten eingeht. 13. Durch Quittierung Empfangs Liefergegenständen Abnahme Billigung vorgelegter Zeichnungen verzichten Gewährleistungsansprüche sonstige Rechte. 14. Die § 640 Absatz 1 Satz 3 geregelte fiktive Abnahme ausgeschlossen. 15. Die Abnahme Fertigstellungsbescheinigung § 641a BGB ausgeschlossen. VIII. Unterlagen Bestellung, Gegenstände 1. Stellt Lieferant Werkzeuge, Formen, Modelle, Klischees usw. unseren Angaben bzw. Konstruktionsunterlagen her, hierzu Verfügung gestellten Unterlagen Muster Erledigung Auftrags unaufgefordert innerhalb 10 Arbeitstagen zurückzugeben. 2. Der Lieferant verpflichtet ausdrücklich, Verfügung gestellten Unterlagen, Muster Gegenstände schriftliche Einwilligung Dritten weder Einsichtnahme Verfügung überlassen hiernach hergestellten Gegenstände Einverständnis Dritte auszuhändigen. 3. Mit vollständigen Bezahlung Werkzeuge, Formen Vorrichtungen Eigentum über. Die übergabe Werkzeuge Aufbewahrungspflicht Lieferanten Ausführung Aufträge leihweise überlassung Werkzeuge Lieferanten ersetzt. 4. Der Lieferant haftet für Verlust, Beschädigung missbräuchliche Verwendung Werkzeuge, Formen bzw. Vorrichtungen entstandenen Schaden. Das Risiko Untergangs trägt ebenfalls Lieferant. IX. Produkthaftung, Freistellung 1. Werden Lieferanten verletzter behördlicher Sicherheitsvorschriften aufgrund in- ausländischer Produkthaftungsregelungen Fehlerhaftigkeit unseres Produkts Anspruch genommen, Erzeugnis Lieferanten zurückzuführen ist, berechtigt, Lieferanten Ersatz Schadens verlangen, insoweit Produkte bedingt ist. Das selbe gilt Maßnahmen aufgrund Produktsicherheitsgesetzes. 2. Der Lieferant verpflichtet, Rahmen Produktverantwortlichkeit Schadensersatzansprüchen Dritter Anfordern freizustellen. In Rahmen Lieferant verpflichtet, etwaige Aufwendungen erstatten, Zusammenhang durchgeführten Rückrufaktion ergeben. X. Konzernverrechnungsklausel Wir berechtigt, fällige nichtfällige, künftige Forderungen aufzurechnen, Zeim Systems Zeimag AG Lieferanten gegenüber zustehen bzw. Lieferant bezeichneten Firmen hat. XI. Schutzrechte 1. Der Lieferant garantiert sichert zu, sämtliche Lieferungen frei Schutzrechten Dritter insbesondere Lieferung Benutzung Liefergegenstände Patente, Lizenzen sonstige Schutzrechte Dritter innerhalb Deutschlands verletzt werden. Sofern Lieferanten ist, Produkte bestimmten Ländern vertrieben werden, gilt vorstehendes für Länder. 2. Der Lieferant stellt Kunden Ansprüchen Dritter etwaigen Schutzrechtsverletzungen frei trägt Kosten, Zusammenhang entstehen. 3. Wir berechtigt, Berücksichtigung Sorgfaltspflicht ordentlichen Kaufmanns Kosten Lieferanten Genehmigung Benutzung betreffenden Liefergegenstände Leistungen Berechtigten bewirken. XII. Sonstiges, Gerichtsstand, Erfüllungsort, Salvatorische Klausel 1. Für Montage gelten ergänzend besonderen Montagebedingungen. 2. Zeichnungen Lieferanten über Maschinenteile, usw., Verschleiss unterliegen übersichtszeichnungen ähnliche Unterlagen kostenlos Verfügung stellen. Damit steht Recht zu, Zeichnungen Erstellung Ersatzteilen, änderungen dergleichen beauftragte Dritte benutzen. Ansprüche Verletzung Rechten Lieferanten bleiben Falle ausgeschlossen. 3. Für etwaige Besuche, Ausarbeitung Planungen dergleichen keinerlei Vergütung gewährt. Die Einreichung Angeboten stets kostenlos. 4. Sofern ausdrücklich anderes vereinbart wurde, Erfüllungsort für Lieferverpflichtung angegebene Empfangsstelle bzw. Verwendungsstelle. 6. Sollten einzelne Teile Allgemeinen Einkaufsbedingungen unwirksam sein, Wirksamkeit übrigen Bestimmungen hierdurch berührt. 7. B. Gelenkendoprothetik) konventionellen Spitzzahn entwickelten "Rundzahn" . Der Rundzahn Kern Erfindung Gestaltung Raspelzähne (3). Diese Raspelzähne (3) abgerundeten Meißel erzeugt, Raspelschneiden (4) Raspelzähne (3) Zahngruben (5) gleichmäßige, vorzugsweise kreisbogenförmige Krümmung aufweisen. Die einzelnen Raspelschneiden (4) stehen frei erhaben größeren Abständen zueinander. Erst Raspeln ergänzen geschlossenen Arbeitsfläche. Durch Form Raspelzähne (3) Raspel insgesamt aggressiv lässt einfach reinigen, Übergangsbereich Zahngruben (5) Raspelzähnen (3) Ecke gebildet ist, lediglich gleichmäßig gekrümmte Linie. Der Rundzahn verbessert Vielfaches Ausarbeitung Prothesenbettes Markraum. Zusammenfassend wichtigsten Merkmale Verzahnung - kreisbogenförmige Raspelschneiden Hiebhöhen 0,3 - 1,0 mm / + 0,1 mm - breite, eckenlose Zahngruben (Selbstreinigungseffekt) - gelockerte Anordnung Kompaktzähne zueinander - extreme Schärfe Schneiden optimaler Durchlässigkeit Markraum Empfehlung: Auf Anfrage teilen Ihnen gerne verschiedene Stahlsorten mit, Verzahnung bewährt haben. CUTPRO - staubfreie Hohlfrässystem! - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt Produktangebot > CUTPRO - staubfreie Hohlfrässystem! CUTPRO Das staubfreie Hohlfrässystem - ...gibt Staub Chance! Als Anfang 80er Jahre staubfreie Hohlfrässystem entwickelten, alte Bearbeitungsmethode revolutioniert: Durch hohl ausgebildete Werkzeug gelangen Staub Späne Öffnungen Innere hohle Antriebswelle Absauganlage befördert. Im Laufe Jahre System Bearbeitungssparten durchgesetzt wegzudenken. Wir Zeichen Zeit erkannt unserem Hohlfräser CUTPRO Wege. 6 Gründe, Sie für Werkzeug entscheiden 1. Gegenüber vergleichbaren Werkzeugen CUTPRO Vielfaches höheren Standweg Verwendung Hochleistungsstahl. 2. Durch Verwendung stark dimensionierten Rotationskörpers möglich, Werkzeug mehrfach verzahnen. 3. Selbst großen Zerspanungsleistungen sorgt optimale Schnittunterteilung für hohe Laufruhe. 4. Optimale Schneidgeometrie ermöglicht sauberste Oberflächen. 5. Optimierte Absaugleistung Ungleichteilung. 6. Stufenlos wählbare Längen Durchmesser. Sonderformen Ihren Wünschen lieferbar! Althergebrachte Techniken Messer, Klingen, Scheren Schleifern gehören Einsatz Gerätes Vergangenheit an. Speziell Entgraten Trennnähten, mittig ebenen gewölbten Form-schaumoberflächen verlaufen, entfernt Gratex rippenartigen Verhärtungen Arbeitsgang. Das Rotiermesser speziell für Anwendungsfall konzipiert. Die Schnittkufe sorgt dafür, Gerät geführt entfernende Grat positionsgenau Schneidebereich Messers gelangt. Durch hochwertigen Basisrohstoff Spezialschliff für Formschaum Schnitt Lebensdauer erreicht. Wenn Messer Schärfe verliert, Anwender sofort integrierten Schleifstift Schärfe herstellen. Dieser Vorgang mehrfach wiederholt werden. Gratex 20 Gratex 44 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. (2) Deviating conditions of the buyer which are not expressly accepted by the seller are not binding; even if the seller does not expressly reject them. (3) In the same way as conclusion and interpretation of legal transactions with the buyer; inclusion and interpretation of these terms and conditions of sale and delivery are regulated exclusively according to the legislation of the Federal Republic of German. The application of the uniform law for the conclusion of international purchase contracts for movable assets, of the uniform law for the international purchase of movable assets of the UN purchase law is excluded. (4) The inefficiency of single provisions of this contract or parts of it does not affect the efficiency of the remaining provisions. As far as reasonable, the contract parties are obliged good faith to replace the ineffective provision by effective regulation similar its economic success, as far as no other significant change of the contract contents results; the same applies if no provision is expressly stipulated for fact requiring regulation. (5) Place of fulfilment for all obligations resulting indirectly and directly from this contract relation, including payment duty, is the registered office of the seller. (6) Place of jurisdiction is the place of court competent for the registered office of the seller, as far as the buyer is businessman. The seller is entitled to institute legal proceedings at court competent for the registered office or establishment of the buyer. § 2 Quotations, scope of services and contract conclusion (1) Contract proposals of the seller are without engagement. (2) For the scope of services to be rendered according to contract the order confirmation of the seller is exclusively relevant. (3) The buyer reserves the right to changes of the design, the material choice, the specification and the type even after submission of order confirmation, as far as these changes are neither inconsistent with the order confirmation nor with the specification of the buyer. Moreover, the buyer agree to further proposals for modifications made by the seller as far as they are reasonable for the buyer. (4) Partial deliveries are permitted. (5) The documents being the basis of the quotation or the order confirmation, as figures, drawings, dimension and weight details, are normally to be understood only as approximate values, far as they are not expressly identified as binding. § 3 Prices and terms and conditions of payment (1) The prices are to be understood ex works, excluding packing and other dispatch and transport charges. The packing be charged at cost price and only taken back if the seller is obliged to do by virtue of imperative legal regulation. (2) If more than 4 months have passed between contract conclusion and delivery and the seller is not responsible for this delay delivery he is entitled to increase the price reasonably taking into consideration the accrued material costs, labour costs and other additional expenses which have to be borne by the seller. If the purchase price is increased by more than 40% the buyer is entitled to withdraw from contract. (3) If the seller takes into account requests for changes made by the buyer the correspondingly accruing additional costs be invoiced to the buyer. (4) In case of culpable non-observance of the payment term, interests of 8% above the respectively valid base interest rate be claimed under reservation of assertion of further claims. § 4 Offset and detention Offset and detention are excluded, unless the claim for offset is indisputable or legally ascertained. § 5 Delivery date A delivery date is specified to the best knowledge and is prolonged appropriately if the buyer delays or fails to carry out the necessary agreed cooperation actions on his part. The same applies case of measures the framework of industrial conflicts, especially strikes and lock-outs as well as with the occurrence of unforeseeable obstacles beyond the of the seller, e.g. delays delivery of sub-supplier, traffic and operational disturbances, lack of material or energy, etc. Modifications of the delivered goods decided by the buyer result reasonable prolongation of the delivery date. § 6 Transfer of risk The risk is transferred to the buyer once the seller has made available the goods to the buyer and advises the buyer correspondingly. § 7 Reservation of ownership (1) The seller reserves ownership of the delivered goods until complete payment. The reservation of ownership applies until all future and conditional accounts receivable from the business relation between buyer and seller are settled. (2) The buyer is not entitled to chattel mortgage and pledging of the goods, however, to further disposal of the goods under reservation within regular transaction. He cedes the resulting claims against his business partners to the seller already now. (3) If the goods are machined or processed by the buyer the reservation of ownership applies to the entire new item. The buyer acquires co-ownership according to the fractional amount corresponding to the proportion of the value of his goods and the goods delivered by the seller. (4) If the value of all securities of the seller exceeds the actual claims effectively by more than 10 % the seller release the securities at his option on request of the buyer. (5) The seller is entitled to assert the rights of reservation of ownership without withdrawing from contract. § 8 Warranty claims (1) If the purchase is commercial transaction for both parties the buyer has to inspect goods directly on receipt, as far as this is opportune according to regular transaction, and if defect is detected he has to notify the seller immediately. If the buyer fails to do the goods are considered to be approved unless it is defect which not identifiable on inspection. For the rest, §§ 377 ff. of the HGB (Commercial Code) apply. (2) The warranty claims are limited to subsequent fulfilment. In case of failure of the subsequent fulfilment the buyer is entitled to demand reduction of remuneration or rescission of contract at his choice. (3) Further claims of the buyer are excluded as far as they do not result from acceptance of guarantee. This rule does not apply case of deliberate act, negligence or breach of material contractual obligations on part of the seller. (4) The warranty claims prescribe one year after delivery of the purchased item. § 9 Liability Compensation claims of the buyer are excluded. This does not apply case of deliberate act, negligence or breach of material contractual obligations on part of the seller or acceptance of guarantee. Purchase conditions I. General, scope of application We exclusively place orders based on our General Purchase Conditions; we do not accept contrary or deviating purchase conditions of the supplier, unless we approved them writing. II. Quotation, contract conclusion 1. If the supplier does not accept order placed by us within two weeks after receipt we are not bound to the quotation anymore. 2. Orders, contracts of any types or their amendments or supplements are only effective if they have been made writing or by data transfer or on data media readable by machine. 3. The execution of our order is considered as acceptance of our conditions. III. Prices, invoices, payment, assignment of claims, offset, right of retention 1. The agreed prices are fixed prices and apply free consignee’s works, including packing and transport charges as well as transport insurance plus the respectively valid statutory value added tax, if not otherwise agreed the contract. As far as different agreements have been made individual contracts, the regulations of the Incoterms the respectively valid version and/or the rules for the uniform interpretation of the contract clauses of the International Chamber of Commerce, Paris apply for the determination of pricing terms. 2. The payment is made either with discount of 3 % within 30 days after delivery/service and receipt of proper invoice as well as the approval of the goods after inspection or after 90 days net. 3. The supplier is not entitled to offset with alleged claims against our companies without our previous approval except the claim has been found to be undisputed or legally valid. 4. The assertion of retention right by the supplier due to not accepted counterclaims or counterclaims which are not legally ascertained is excluded as far as these claims are not based on the same contractual relationship. 5. Contractual claims against us based on or connection with the order become time-barred after expiry of two years after the date of receipt of the delivery and the invoice. IV. Dispatch, delivery, transfer of risk 1. All order references and order numbers always have to be repeated the documents relating to our order (order confirmation, delivery note, freight documents, invoices, etc.). 2. Delivery notes and invoices are to be submitted duplicate. 3. A clearance of the trucks takes place only from Monday to Thursday from 7.30 a.m. to 3.00 p.m., on Friday from 7.30 a.m. to 1.00 p.m. or as especially agreed. 4. We only accept higher costs and allowable expenses accruing due to deviation from the normal dispatch process or from the type of dispatch we required (road, railway or similar) if they have been previously agreed writing. This applies especially if the goods have to be dispatched by express due to missed deadline. 5. All consignments are to be cleared without freight costs or additional charges. Our respective dispatch regulations have to be observed exactly. 6. The dispatch is carried out at risk of the supplier. The risk of any impairment, including accidental loss, remains with the supplier until handover at the requested delivery address and/or at the point of use. 7. The supplier is liable for the consequences of incorrect B/L declaration. A dispatch note has to be submitted immediately on departure of any single consignment. If point of receipt, department, Battenfeld article number, order number, reference or details of issue are missing the dispatch documents all accruing costs are to be borne by the supplier. 8. We only accept partial deliveries after previous written approval. If partial consignments have been agreed the remaining quantity has to be executed. 9. If delivery is carried out earlier than agreed we reserve the right to send the goods back to the account of the supplier. If the goods are not sent back case of early delivery we store them on account and at risk of the supplier. The payment of the invoice be executed due time referring to the agreed date. V. Delivery dates, delays delivery, penalties, acceptance of the goods, rescission 1. The dates agreed are binding. The receipt of the goods perfect quality at the delivery address we indicated and/or at the point of use and/or the timeliness of the successful acceptance are decisive for the observance of the delivery date or the delivery time. 2. If the supplier realises that the agreed dates cannot be observed for any reasons he has to inform us immediately writing indicating the reasons and the duration of the delay. 3. In case of delay delivery we are entitled to claim penalty of 0.1% of the value of the goods to be delivered per working day delay, however, maximum 5 % of the value of the goods to be delivered. We have the right to declare reservation of the penalty to the supplier still within 10 working days from receipt of the delayed delivery. VI. Environmental protection and accident prevention regulations The supplier is obliged to take all necessary precautions for the environmental protection and the industrial safety and to consider all regulatory and legal requirements. We are entitled to demand certificate of the competent professional association from which the observance of all regulations for the prevention of accidents results. VII. Specification, guarantee, liability 1. The supplier guarantees that at the moment of delivery all objects he delivered and services he rendered correspond to the latest state-of-art, to the relevant legal provisions and regulations and to the guidelines of authorities, professional associations and trade associations. If deviations from these regulations are necessary certain individual cases the supplier has to ask for our written approval. The obligation of warranty and/or guarantee of the supplier is not affected by this approval. 2. We have principally the right to choose the type of additional fulfilment, even case of contract for services. § 439 BGB (German civil code) applies correspondingly. 3. We have the right to remove defect and demand the compensation of the necessary expenses case of defect at the product delivered or of the performed service after unsuccessful expiry of appropriate time we determined for the additional fulfilment if the supplier does not refuse the additional fulfilment rightfully. In this regard the legal regulation for self-execution case of service contracts (§ 637 BGB) applies correspondingly for the purchase contract. Without prejudice of the legal regulation, we have the right to remove the defect ourselves to the account of the supplier urgent cases, and especially to hold off acute risk of significant damages even without fixing period for additional fulfilment. 4. If we had to take back the good delivered or the service rendered by the supplier, if we had to accept reduction of the purchase price and/or of the remuneration or if our customer claims indemnity or reimbursement of expenses as consequence to deficiency of the goods delivered and/or the service rendered by the supplier, appointment of date - otherwise necessary - is not required for our guarantee claims against the supplier (§§ 437, 634 BGB) due to the claim ascertained by the customer against us. 5. We are entitled to claim compensation of the expenses from the supplier which we have to pay to our customer regarding additional fulfilment (especially the accrued transport, road, working and material costs) if the defect claimed by our customer had already existed on transfer of risk to us. 6. The guarantee period amounts to 24 months, as far as not otherwise expressly agreed. It starts on handing-over of the delivered item to us or to the third party we named at the place of receipt and/or use designated by us. As far as acceptance has to be carried out according to law or contract, the guarantee period starts with successful acceptance. If the acceptance of the delivered item is delayed without fault of the supplier the guarantee period starts 12 months after provision of the delivered item for acceptance at the latest. 7. If defect occurs within the first 12 months of the guarantee period it is assumed that this defect already existed at the moment of transfer of risk, except this assumption is inconsistent with the type of matter or of defect. 8. All above-mentioned warranty claims and legal guarantee claims become time-barred 24 months after raising the warranty claim within the guarantee period as far as legislation or contract do not provide longer period. However, the period of limitation does not end before end of the guarantee period. The limitation of the above-mentioned warranty claims and legal guarantee claims applies two months after the moment at which we have met possible recourse claims of our customer based on this defect at the earliest. This inhibition of expiry ends five years after the supplier has delivered the item to us and/or we have accepted the service at the latest. 9. If the supplier meets his obligation of additional fulfilment by removal of the defect the period of limitation for this service newly starts after acceptance of the works for the removal of the defect. If the supplier meets his obligation of additional fulfilment by replacement the period of limitation newly starts for the product / service delivered as replacement after its handing-over/acceptance. 10. In case of defects of title the supplier indemnifies us from possibly existing claims of third parties. The period of limitation for defects of title amounts to three years. This period of limitation starts with the end of the year which the claim occurred and which we learned about the circumstances of the claim and about the person of defaulter or which this should have taken place without culpable negligence, irrespective of the knowledge or the grossly negligent lack of knowledge within ten years from appearance. 11. If the supplier has concerns regarding the type of execution which we desire or if he detects errors our documents or drawings he is obliged to inform us immediately writing. 12. The inspection of the goods for possible deviations quality and quantity is carried out due time if it takes place within 10 working days after handing-over; the notice of defect is made time if the supplier receives it within 10 working days after detection. 13. By acknowledgement of the receipt of the delivered items and by acceptance or approval of the presented drawings we do not waive any warranty claims or other rights. 14. The notional acceptance regulated § 640 clause 1 sentence 3 is excluded. 15. The acceptance by completion certificate according to § 641a BGB is excluded. VII. Documents for order, items 1. If the supplier produces tools, moulds, models, printing plates, etc. according to our specifications and/or design documents the documents and samples which we made available have to be returned to us after completion of the order within 10 workings without request. 2. The supplier expressly undertakes not to leave the documents, samples and items made available to him to third person neither for reference nor for disposal without our written consent and not to hand over to third person the items produced on this basis without our approval. 3. The tools, moulds or equipment become our property with full payment. The transfer of the tools to us is replaced by the duty of retention of the supplier and the surrender of the tools to the supplier on loan basis to execute our orders. 4. The supplier is liable for any prejudice caused by loss, damage or improper use of the tools, moulds and/or equipment. The supplier bears the risk of loss. IX. Product liability, release 1. If claims are made on us due to regulatory safety regulations violated by the supplier or due to domestic or foreign product liability regulations regarding the defectiveness of our product which is traced back to product of the supplier we are entitled to demand compensation of the damage from the supplier, as far as he is involved due to his products. The same applies for actions against us on the basis of the product safety law. 2. The supplier is obliged to release us from compensation claims of third persons on first request within the scope of his product responsibility. In this regard, the supplier is obliged to compensate possible expenses resulting from or connection with call-back we possibly have to carry out. X. Corporate clearance clause We are entitled to carry out clearance by and against due and undue, future claims to which the Zeim Systems or Zeim PLC is entitled against the supplier and/or to which the supplier has right against mentioned companies. XI. Property rights 1. The supplier guarantees and ensures that all deliveries are free from property rights of third persons and especially that patents, licences or other property rights of third persons within Germany are not violated by the delivery or the use of the delivered items. If the supplier knows that we sell his products certain countries the aforementioned applies for these countries. 2. The supplier indemnifies us and our customers from claims of third persons resulting from possible violations of property rights and bears all costs which we have to pay this context. 3. Taking into consideration the due diligence of prudent businessman we are entitled to obtain the approval for use of the respective delivered items and services from the beneficiary to the account of the supplier. XII. Miscellaneous, court of jurisdiction, place of fulfilment, severability clause 1. Additionally our special assembly conditions apply for assemblies. 2. Drawings of the supplier for machine parts, etc. which are subject to wear, as well as general drawings and similar documents are to be put at our disposal free of charge. For this reason, we have the right to use these drawings ourselves or by third parties we have engaged to produce spare parts, carry out modifications or similar. Claims resulting from the violation of rights of the supplier are excluded at any rate. 3. Possible visits, preparation of scheduling and similar are not reimbursed. The submission of quotations is always free-of-charge. 4. If the supplier is businessman, legal person of public law or responsible body of public-legal special assets the court of jurisdiction is the court competent for our headquarters or the subsidiary receiving the delivery. However, we have the right to sue the supplier at his general court of jurisdiction. The same applies if the supplier has no general court of jurisdiction at home, has relocated his domicile or usual residence from home after contract conclusion or if his domicile or usual place of residence are not known at the moment of legal action. 5. As far as not expressly otherwise agreed, the place of fulfilment for the delivery obligation is the place of receipt and/or the place of use which we indicated. 6. If single parts of these General Purchase Conditions are ineffective the validity of the remaining provisions is not affected. 7. Additionally the legislation of the Federal Republic of Germany applies excluding the Conventions Relating to A Uniform Law on the International Sale of Goods of the UN from 11 April 1980. 8. Contract language is German. If the contract partners use another language the German wording has priority. ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Medical Rasp - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Medical Rasp Medical Rasp Toothing of rasps for the endoprostheses For more than 5 decades we are engaged providing anatomic rasps for medical purposes with individual rasp toothing, specially for use surgical operations (e.g. joint endoprostheses), namely by means of the traditional "Pointed Tooth" and the "Round Tooth" which had been developed by us. Round tooth Root of this innovation is the shaping of the rasp teeth (3). These rasp teeth (3) are produced by rounded chisel that the rasp circular cut forms (4) of the rasp teeth (3) as well as the tooth pits (5) show homogeneous circular arcprofile. Each of the rasp circular cut form (4) stand freely and raised and are placed wide apart from each other. Just when grating closed working surface is produced, thus showing great permeability. By means of this tooth shape of the rasp teeth (3) the anatomic rasp becomes all all less aggressive and can be specially well and easily cleaned, especially since no corner is produced the transition region between the tooth pits (5) and the rasp teeth (3), but merely homogeneous rounded line. By means of this tooth shape of the rasp teeth (3) the rasp becomes all all less aggressive and can be extremely easily cleaned, especially since no corner is produced the transition region between the tooth pits (5) and the rasp teeth (3), but merely homogeneous rounded line. The “Round tooth” improves the preparation of the prostheses bed the meduallary canal many times over. To sum up the most important elements of the invention - rasp circular cut forms with cut heights of 0,3 - 1,0 mm / + 0,1 mm - wide, non-edged tooth pits (self-cleaning effect) - loosen arrangement of the compact teeth to each other - extreme sharpness of the rasp circular cut forms with optimal permeability the medullary canal Advice: On demand we are quite prepared to inform you of the different steel types which proved success concerning toothing.Of course, the traditional rasp toothing is still available. MultiCut - Cutting & milling of foam materials - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > MultiCut - Cutting & milling of foam materials MultiCut 44.000 motions per minute on smallest space - that is the secret of sawing new scope of work. The high-frequency swinging motion of only 3 mm of the special saw-blade deflashes, parts, saws, cuts materials being considered as complicated with conventional technique or as not possible to be worked. The complete capsule enables you even the use under difficult conditions. Thanks to its ergonomic form, the light MultiCut of only 580g can be guided exactly and pre-cisely. By turning the tool and the thumb position, the user has perfectly the feel of the cutting depth. The power supply is already completely equipped; thus over-load protection and speed controlling device for the swinging motion for the individual material accomodation belong to the series volume. The special processing tools being included the Delivery Volume nearly cover effectively each processing problem (ref. application examples): from nonferrous metals up to plexiglass, glass-fiber reinforced plastic or wood - no problem. However, shouldn´t it be possible to solve application problem with the available tools, we are able to develop problem solution for the particular case of application. The processing of thermoplastic synthetic materials: e.g. the removing of cutouts for the pick-up of additional head lights. The MultiCut is universal helper for the exhibition decor and for decorative objects as this branch is working with the most different materials at all, such as polystyrene, plexiglass, thin sheet metals, wood, cardboard articles or floor coverings. For all applications absolutely necessary all-round helper. In the orthopedic shoe technique, valuable natural leather is being cut and worked. An exact contour cutting, precise work - no problem for the MultiCut. The versatility and efficiency are shown among other things by the fact that the technician can now better process thermally deformable plastics, cast-resin parts of plastics and cork insoles with the MultiCut. Arguments for the SWINGCUT: - no rough drilling - no fraying out - no disturbing burrs - no deforming of the material by frictional heat Delivery volume (standard): MultiCut, power supply, tool kit, 1 special key, 3 saw-blades (CUT 1, CUT 2 and CUT 3). Delivery volume (Opto): Execution as per customer´s specification (e.g. for the fixing-in devices). CUT 1: saw-blade, cutting-edge convex, pitch 1.18 mm, conical relief grinding. Application: processing of thin sheet metals, nonferrous flat metal parts and all kinds of materials. CUT 2: like CUT 1, however, with double relief grinding and one-sided radius of the saw bevel Application: Processing of materials with disadvantageous thermal expansion CUT 3: knife, cutting-edge concave, one-sided long and opposite-sided with short chamfer Application: Cutting of all kinds of soft plastics CUT OPTO: execution as per customer´s specification Multicut ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Typ SC 98 - Hot Wire Desk Top Unit - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Typ SC 98 - Hot Wire Desk Top Unit Typ SC 98 Hot Wire Desk Top Unit for cutting Polystyrol Rigid Foam (PS) The desk top unit is qualified for cutting Polystyrol Rigid Foam (PS). The operative range consists of aluminium sectional frame, the working table is plasticlaminated. The working temperature can be adjusted infinitely variable by means of adjusting knob. The heating wire, being directly electrical heated via transformer, is about 600 °C hot within approx. 10 seconds. The heating transformer is located under the working plate. The clamp clip resp. the clamps which hold the heating wire are disconnected safely from the mains by means of safety transformer according to VDE 0551. The tension at the clamps is approx. 12 volt. Features TYP 98 Cutting element diameter 0,8 mm stretched over bracket Cutting height 400 mm Temperature 600°C adjustable Sizes 600 500 mm Power supply 230 V Frequency 50-60 Hz Output 250 W Extras: Parallel ruler, circle cutting device, cross cutting gauge, longitudinal ruler, hand-modelling pin Typ SC 98 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. The cylinder cutter SpeedMaster HSC convinces of dynamic and qualitative high-grade milling results. Advantages at glance • The spiral cutting arrangement guarantees the smallest forward feed during milling and drilling. • Special grinded fine-cuts are result of a special sharpening procedure by multiaxis CNC-controlled grinding machines. • Optimal formation of swarf for resistance-free removal of chips. • Quiet running and no vibrations because of the chip breaking spiral. • Environment and user friendly operation because of noise reduction as well as the pulling removing action of the HSC blade. • The SpeedMaster HSC is available with direct suction. • Usually we supply our self-designed QGS pick-up attachment for direct suction or with cylindrical shank. • Other tool pick-up attachments are available as extra (e.g. MK, SK and HSK). • High-quality materials and computercontrolled PLASMA-IONEN hardening system are the basis for long durability. CUTPRO - staubfreie Hohlfrässystem! - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > CUTPRO - staubfreie Hohlfrässystem! CUTPRO ...doesn't give dust chance! At the beginning of the eighties , when we developed the dustfree hollow milling system, old processing method had been thereby revolutionized: Dust and shavings get through the aspiration holes of the hollowed tool into the inside from where they are removed via the hollow shaft to the exhaust system. In the course of the years, the system has made its way into many new fields of processing and one can scarcely imagine working without it. We have recognized the signs of the times and are now applying new methods with our hollow cutter CUTPRO. 6 reasons to decide on our tool 1. Considering comparable tools, the CUTPRO has longer tool life many times over by using high performance steel. 2. Using very dimensioned body of revolution allows the repeated resharpening of the tool. 3. An optimum tool configuration ensures quiet running, even for great chip removing capacities. 4. An optimum cutting geometry enables cleanest surfaces. 5. Optimized suction performance due to the arrangement of the teeth. 6. Infinitely variable lengthes and diameters Special profiles according to your specifications are available. CUTPRO ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Milling machine TMM 95/100/105/110/150 The spindle milling machine TMM 95/100/105/110/150 is indispensable for the processing of work pieces made of foam materials. The machine works reliably and precisely thanks to the double supported and adjustable stop rulers. A spindle stroke of 100 mm and different speed options provide for processing of large raw thicknesses together with three-phase current motor of 1.5 - 2.8 kW. Gratex - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Gratex Gratex Pneumatic Deflasher for flexible foam plastics Ease of use and rationalization - the new characteristics of the Gratex. The older techniques known up to now using knifes, blades, scissors or grinders now belong to the past due to the use of the Gratex. It has been especially designed for deflashing parted seams the middle of level or curved moulded surfaces. The Gratex removes ribbed hardenings one process. The rotary knife has been developed for this application. The special cutting skid ensures that the unit can be easily guided and that the foam to be removed is exactly positioned into the cutting area of the knife. As it is high quality product with special grind for formed foams, excellent cut can be achieved together with longer life expectancy. When wear of the knife occurs the user can resharpen it with the pencil grinder as new. This process can be repeated many times over. Gratex 20 Gratex 44 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Rillo - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Rillo Rillo Easy tailoring The Euro Rillo is pneumatically operated hand cutting machine which - combined with various exchangeable tools - should not miss the prototype or small-lot production. There are no limits for individual shaping, even not with very flexible foam qualities. An exact shaping and very smooth cutting surfaces are ensured thanks to the use of efficient high-speed drives and harmonised tool toothing. The Euro Rillo is designed for the connection to industrial vacuum cleaner that the working environment remains clean. The guide block with ruler is further help to support efficiently the various possibilities (option). The cutting tool is manufactured according to your special requirements. We only need sketch/drawing or detailed description of your case of application - benefit from our experience. FoamKnife - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > FoamKnife FoamKnife The individual knife for foam processing The solution for: Designers, upholsterers, interior decorators, prototypes, décors (Film & TV), . . The FoamKnife is electrically or pneumatically driven hand-cutting machine for precise processing of flexible foam, proofed horsehair, and similar materials. The high-quality processing enables operation of low vibration and noise as well as fatigue-proof working due to the comfortable handling. By means of the harmonised counter-rotating convex ground knives perfect cutting surface pattern is achieved. The guide support on the back enables the use of saw blades up to length of 750 mm. FoamKnives are available standard lengths of 70, 130, 200, 300, 450, 600 and 750 mm. As option, the knives allow to go into the foam up to length of 300 mm. For this version, the guiding plate is not necessary. Furthermore, the radius knife is available as option that highly exact radii can be achieved at the foam parts. Depending on the technical feasibility the radii are produced to your individual needs. These ideas have been developed practice. Probably new proposals can be added thanks to your specific application which we appreciate to implement. FoamKnife table - for ZEIM foam cutting knife - for electric and pneumatic operation - fixing and starting split seconds . . . with the ZEIM quick change system, no problem! - Insertable with all ZEIM knife systems - Clean cuts, if straight or complex shapes - Cutting angle adjustable up to 45° Extras: - Foot switch, ball lock valve with quick coupling, ruler - Table size: B T = approx. 60 70 cms - Working height adjustable from 68 up to 80 cms Zeim FoamKnife Table FoamKnife ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Profile cutter Z700 - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Profile cutter Z700 Profile cutter Z700 ZEIM recycling cutters for expanded polystyrene (EPS) Task definition : Generation of shavings suitable for recycling that avoid the obstruction of the bar screens the block form. Thereby the quality of finish shows acceptable planed surface. Solution: The geometry of the cutting teeth has been completely modified compared with the traditional rasp toothing which means that the desired size of the cutting grain is achieved with few number of tooth lines (that guarantee nevertheless sufficient overlapping of the teeth) using adequate speed and advance parameters. Conditions: In order to minimise the downtimes (clearance of the bar screens) when producing EPS with recyclable shavings, the usage of dust collecting device is absolutely necessary: - On the one hand for filtering the dust generated the raw granulation or by the crushing machine. - On the other hand for removing the fine shavings which can account for up to 10 % of all shavings caused during processing. Profile cutter Z700 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Profile cutter Z500.M - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Profile cutter Z500.M Profile cutter Z500.M A friction reducing coating rationalizes the working Due to the dense, pointed rasp toothing geometry and the friction reducing special coating, complicated geometries even strong abrasive materials (like bonded foam) can be milled. An overview of the advantages • Conduction of the heating by the M-special coating (no melting of the materials, no deposits on the tool) effectively prevents the shavings from sticking to the tool. • Although sometimes complicated tool geometries are required, excellent cutted profile can be achieved by the many and very aggressive rasp teeth. The difference productivity comparison with standard tooling is clearly noticeable. Profile cutter Z500.M ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Segment cutting tool Z500 - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Segment cutting tool Z500 Segment cutting tool Z500 HM provided segment cutting tool The advantages of the Z500 • Vibration-free cutting close to the chain conveyor. Through the recess of the hub, the enclosed bush can operate at every position, near to the material as well as across the centre of the axis. • Silent through the closed form of the ZEIM cutting tool. • Machine designed edge saw trimmer without tooth spaces: the trimming saws can be resharpened without stop, on any machine. • Modular system: thanks to the mounting of further cutting units by flanging it is possible to increase the width from 22 mm to 40 mm or from 58 mm to 76 mm. Exchangeable cutting attachments: All cutting attachments, the enlargement units, are the same that the attachments can run every position. Through different blunts with differing gripping widths, the cutting attachments with mounted segments can be separately exchanged. Centring the milling attachments: The turned and ground edge is used to centre the trimming saws. Therefore they can be unscrewed for resharpening without having to remove the whole unit from the machine. Furthermore, the same centring ring is used by the enlargement units the previous attachments and provides for absolute rotation and additional safety. Segment cutting tool Z500 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Saw blades Z1500 - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Saw blades Z1500 Saw blades Z1500 Optimally aligned to the work piece materials and the field of application Characteristics of the Z-series • Most modern saw technology for highest demands on edge quality, cutting performance and profitability. • Laser-cut main blade made from high-tensile steel with high stability and impact resistance, under continuous stress. • Hard metal cutting material with special wear resistance against mechanical and chemical stress. • High cutting quality and durability with large forward feeds by optimum design of the tooth form, chip space, blade form and angle geometry. • An extremely thin special circular saw enables considerable saving of material for unravelling of plastics on multiple-side surface planing and milling machines. • You can choose from wide range of tooth forms. CNC tools - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > CNC tools CNC Tools VHM, PKD/CBN, HM, HSS, WSP Application-oriented tool solutions We manufacture application-oriented tool solutions according to latest sophisticated technology on tool grinding machines of up to 7 axes with highest precision and different adaptations, as e.g. cylinder shaft, SK, MK, or HSK. Standard tools according to DIN or ISO are not part of the ZEIM manufacturing programme. Following this definition, the ZEIM milling cutters are exclusively drawing-bound tools which are customer-designed and manufactured for very specific machining demands. The modern machinery expanded based on innovative aspects make the manufacture of the most different tool designs connection with all known and available cutting materials possible. - VHM - PKD/CBN - HM - HSS - WSP CNC Tools ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Changemaster Z400 - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Product range > Changemaster Z400 Changemaster Z400 Hard metal cutter to minimise production downtimes It is of great importance for production site to be able to re-start production as quickly as possible case of failures caused for example by wear or rupture. Until now, large and cost-consuming stock of spare parts necessary for this purpose. The Changemaster Z400 offers adequate solution to this problem and can still convince with further advantages: • Longer life thanks to the use of hard metal (HM) • Hard metal segments that can be repeatedly reground • Automatic centring by the depth groove the hard metal segment • Minimisation of downtimes by very quick repair • Low weight due to the use of light metal as basic body (clearly longer life expectancy of the spindle bearings) • noticeable reduction of the costs for spare parts and storage Changemaster Z400 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Milling, rasping, cutting, modelling, deflashing - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact Milling, rasping, cutting, modelling, deflashing The ultimate creative helpers for every idea Thanks to many years of experience, constant innovation and good customer orientation you get customized, specially adapted products to your needs directly from the manufacturer. As we already work since long on international standards due to effective quality management, renowned companies around the world rely on the excellent quality of ZEIMtec for many years. Our engagement at home and especially abroad expanded steadily over the years, that the share of exports total sales accounts for about 90 percent. This is not at least the merit of our international agents who serve our customers strategic positions. Our products are manufactured from the highest quality materials! After all, our customers expect excellent quality and first-class use-value. So we have for every application the right product and the security for smooth reliable working process, among others the industries of foam material producers, upholstery manufacturers, matress production, automotive suppliers, packaging producers, household goods, technical industrial products or of the insulation processors. Processing of rigid and flexible foam materials for the insulation industry, the furniture industry and model workshops. We offer customized solutions for separating, sawing, milling, cut to precise processing among others of PUR FLEXIBLE (Polyurethane flexible foam), PE foam (Polyethylene foam) and rigd foam EPS (expanded Polystyrol), XPS (extruded Polystyrol), PUR RIGID (Polyurethane rigid foam) as well as rubber, caoutchouc, Neopren and cork. Philosophy - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact About us > Philosophy Philosophy Technology is part of our culture. We bear responsibility. Responsibility is reflected our actions, now and for the future. This responsibility commits us towards the society, the customers, the employees and the suppliers. The term quality is important part of our management philosophy and comprises all business areas and function categories. It is our objective to offer products and services of excellent quality and best benefit to our customers. We wish to have satisfied customers with lasting confidence our service range, from advice and problem solution via delivery and assembly to the after-sales service. The opinion of our customers is the decisive quality criterion for us. Significant factors for the achievement of optimal customer satisfaction are the identification of and the following compliance with the requirements regarding product or service that are defined by the specifications of the customer and by the laws and standards effect. The optimal identification of and compliance with these requirements are thus essential obligation of all employees and represent principal business objective. ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. History - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact About us > History History In 1860, August Kessel founded the original rasp cutting shop the main business of which the manufacture of manually cut files and rasps. Today, the company is managed the fifth generation – many things have changed the nearly 150 years of family tradition since foundation. Business fields were extended; permanent growth, worldwide globalisation and new processing ranges and product and service programmes are only some keywords which involve the progressive development of our company. Based on the traditional method of rasp cutting, milling tools for the treatment of hard and soft foam materials for model-making shops, furniture industry and insulating material sector were added. We offer customized solutions for the precise processing of EPS and XPS. Besides, the medical division with respect to the toothing of rasps for endoprothetic purposes developed. Small machinery of own design and manufacture as well as tool production for plant and mechanical engineering are other elements of the diversity of ZEIM. Our worldwide customers from the foam material, wood and plastics industry highly appreciate our experiences of many years the manufacture and maintenance of hard metal tools. For us, family tradition and loyalty stand for transparent team work, since this is one of the most important criteria – besides successful products - to be able to pass on our quality for satisfaction to our customers. In this respect we have stick to our motto for now nearly 150 years. Innovation and progress go along – with true values from the past successfully into the future. And we are proud of it. Quality - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Skip navigation Home Product range News About us History Philosophy Quality Insights Contact About us > Quality Quality It is ZeimTec’s intention to provide high-quality products to its customers of the foamed material industry. Based on the experience of many decades the manufacture of tools and machines, ZeimTec guarantees for first class design and execution thanks to its trained experts. Quality guidelines ZeimTec’s focus is on quality. We supply high-quality products to our customers and offer services that are demanding quality. 1. The satisfaction of our customers is the key to success. For this reason, we want to deliver the quality requested by the customer due time and at fair market prices. The same applies for our subcontractors. 2. The customer sets the benchmark for our quality And we follow it. The adherence to it is our utmost target as it determines the development of our company. 3. Zero error goal Thanks to it, we achieve optimal costs and reach profitability for our company from which every employee benefits by the participation the operating result. 4. Adherence to delivery dates We adhere to the agreed dates. We handle enqueries, offers, sample requests, complaints immediately and with due diligence. 5. Responsibility of every employee Every employee plays important role the overall concept and thus contributes to the achievement of the quality objectives. No matter which position the employee has the company – if he identifies quality risk, he avoids it the limits of his authorities, and otherwise communicates it to his superior. 6. Avoidance of errors instead of elimination of errors To avoid errors right from the beginning, we consistently take proved and tested measures to avoid and identify them. 7. Quality – task of management This task is implemented by the management of the company using target agreements with the employees. Thus, it becomes measurable and is decisively incorporated the performance assessments of the individual. 8. Only with good subcontractors we provide performance Our quality requirements apply for our subcontractors. Since only if they deliver good quality, we are able to reach the customers’ targets. 9. We feel especially committed to environment and society We are used to handle energy and raw materials with care and committed beyond the interests of the company this regard. 10. For us, our quality guidelines are binding Every employee is obliged to adhere to the quality guidelines. ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Auch weichen Schaumqualitäten individuellen Formgebung Grenzen gesetzt. Durch Einsatz leistungsstarken, hochdrehenden Antrieben abgestimmten Werkzeugverzahnung exakte Profilgebung glatte Fräsflächen garantiert. So weichen Schaumqualitäten individuellen Formgebung Grenzen gesetzt. Der FoamDesigner Anschluss Industriestaubsauger vorgesehen, Arbeitsumfeld sauber bleibt. Das Fräswerkzeug speziell Ihren Wünschen gefertigt werden. Dazu benötigen Skizze Zeichnung. Sie können Ihren Anwendungsfall schildern: Wir helfen Ihnen Erfahrung weiter. FoamKnife - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt Produktangebot > FoamKnife FoamKnife Eine elektrisch pneumatisch betriebene Handschneidemaschine für Weichschaumstoff Der Problemlöser für Designer, Polsterer, Raumausstatter, Prototypen, Bühnenbild (Film & TV), ... . Die FoamKnife elektrisch pneumatisch betriebene Handschneidemaschine, exakten Bearbeitung Weichschaumstoff, gummiertem Rosshaar ähnlichen Materialien. Die hochwertige Verarbeitung ermöglicht vibrations- geräuscharmen Lauf ermüdungsfreies Arbeiten aufgrund komfortablen Handhabung. Durch aufeinander abgestimmten gegenläufigen konvex geschliffenen Messer perfektes Schnittbild Schaumstoff erreicht. Die rückseitige Führungsunterstützung ermöglicht Einsetzen Sägeblättern Länge 750 mm. Als Standardlängen Schaumstoffmesser Längen 70, 130, 200, 300, 450, 600 750 mm lieferbar. Als Option Schaumstoffmesser Länge 300 mm Einstechen Schaum ausgestattet. Bei Variante entfällt Schneidfuß. Weiterhin Option Radiusmesser Schaumstoffbearbeitung erhältlich. So lassen exakt Radien Schaumteilen anbringen. Entsprechend technischen Machbarkeit Radien individuell Ihren Wünschen produziert. Diese Ideen Praxis entwickelt worden. Vielleicht Ihre Anwendung Vorschläge hinzu, gerne umsetzen. FoamKnife-Tisch - für ZEIM-Schaumstoff-Schneidemesser - für Elektro- Pneumatik-Betrieb Einspannen loslegen sekundenschnelle... Schnellwechselsystem ZEIM Problem! • Einsetzbar Zeim Messersystemen • Saubere Schnitte – komplexe Formen • Schnittwinkel 45° einstellbar Sonderzubehör: • Fußschalter, Kugelhahnsperrventil Schnellkupplung, Seiten-Anschlag • Tischmaße: B X T = ca. 60 70 cm • Arbeitshöhe einstellbar 68 80 cm FoamKnife-Tisch FoamKnife ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Profilfräser Z700 - Fräser Recyclingfräser Raspel Fräswerkzeug Polystyrol EPS - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt Produktangebot > Profilfräser Z700 - Fräser Recyclingfräser Raspel Fräswerkzeug Polystyrol EPS Profilfräser Z700 ZEIM-Recyclingfräser für expandiertes Polystryrol (EPS) Problemstellung : Erzeugung Wiederverwendung tauglichen Frässpanes, Zusetzen Spaltsiebe Blockform vermeidet. Dabei zeigt Oberflächengüte akzeptables Fräsbild. Lösung: Die Schneidengeometrien gegenüber herkömmlichen Raspelverzahnung grundsätzlich verändert, d. h. geringen Anzahl Schneidenreihen (die dennoch ausreichende Überlappung Schneiden garantiert) entsprechenden Drehzahl- Vorschubparametern gewünschte Fräskorngröße erzeugt. Bedingung: Um Stillstandzeiten (Reinigung Spaltsiebe) Herstellung EPS wiederverwendbaren Frässpänen möglichst gering halten, Verwendung Entstaubungsanlage unbedingt erforderlich, - einen, Rohgranulat bzw. Zerkleinerungsmaschine entstandenen Staub filtrieren. - anderen, spanenden Bearbeitung ca. 10% auftretenden Feinspäne entfernen. Profilfräser Z700 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Profilfräser Z600 - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt Produktangebot > Profilfräser Z600 Profilfräser Z600 Profilfräser schräger messerartigen Verzahnung Problemstellung: Jedes extrudierte Material besitzt Deckschichten Oberflächen ("Skins"), Extrudertyp Unterschiede Härte Dicke aufweisen. Diese Bereiche Problemzonen Fräsen, folgende Nachteile hervorrufen: • schneller Werkzeugverschleiß Bereich "Skins" • auftretende Grate bzw. Ausfransungen Deckschichten Lösung: Durch Schrägstellung messerartigen Verzahnung (statt herkömmlichen Raspelhiebs) aufwerfender Grat fräsenden Plattenbereich hineingezogen. Weiterhin gewährleisten messerartigen Schneiden vollständige Überlappung Schneide Schneide führen hierdurch höheren Standzeit. Vorteile gegenüber Hartmetallfräswerkzeugen • geräuscharmer Lauf • günstiges Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis • komplizierteste Formen sind schnellstmöglich herstellbar Profilfräser Z600 ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O. Profilfräser Z500.M - ZEIM TECHNOLOGY Navigation überspringen Home Produktangebot News/Aktionen Über Historie Philosophie Qualität Einblicke Kontakt Produktangebot > Profilfräser Z500.M Profilfräser Z500.M Profilfräser für anspruchsvolle Fräsgeometrien Durch dichte, spitze Raspelzahngeometrie reibungshemmende Spezialbeschichtung können anspruchsvolle Fräsgeometrien starkabrasiven Materialien (z.B. Verbundschaum) gefräst werden. Die Vorteile Blick • Ableitung Wärme die M-Spezialbeschichtung • Aufschmelzungen Materials, keine Verkrustungen Werkzeug); somit effektive Verhinderung Zusammenklebens Span und Werkzeug. • Trotz Teil aufwendigen Werkzeuggeometrie können erstaunlich hohe Schnittparameter erreicht werden, aggressiven, zahlreichen Raspelzähne. Der Produktivitätsunterschied gegenüber Standard-Werkzeugen deutlich spürbar. Profilfräser Z500.M ZEIM TECHNOLOGY P.O.
